# Muiz Zatam
___

Hey!  
I am **Muiz**, and this is my digital retreat - a personal website and a garden for my thoughts, ideas and writings to flourish. I write upon all that interests me, be it technical blogs or photography or travel or poetry or daily thoughts. You get the idea!

I’m a final-year Computer Science student with a love for building and hacking, whether it’s software, hardware, or anything in between. Professionally, I’m currently interning at a freelancing agency, where I primarily work with Node.js and Express, even though JavaScript isn’t my favorite tool of choice ツ

For personal projects, I prefer working with Rust and Python, often using frameworks like FastAPI, RataTUI, and WebAssembly. I enjoy low-level programming, backend engineering, and studying computer science subject matters like Operating Systems and Software Engineering. I am also a FOSS and Libre enthusiast!

Outside of tech, I love traveling, reading, photography, chess, motorbiking, hiking, playing Mindustry, and diving into whatever else the day offers :)

___
